alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 8:36PM EDT until August 03 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Oswego County in central New York... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 836 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Redfield, or 10 miles northwest of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Central Square, Hastings, Constantia, West Monroe, Mexico, Williamstown, Cleveland, Parish, Amboy Center, and Howardville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
